value.title: Replace text with another column value in Power Query
value.excerpt: Do you know how to replace text dynamically in Power Query using another column's value? Let me show you!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Set Up Power BI Data Gateway to Connect On-Premise Data Sources
value.excerpt: During this session, we will be discussing about how we can install Standard Data Gateway to connect with On-Premise Data sources like SQL Server.  In this session, we have taken an example of On-Premise SQL Server Database. I will explain step by step procedure to install a Gateway and then how we can

value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. Patrick shows you 3 ways that can help do this without using Incremental Refresh or needing Power BI Premium!  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: A new approach for dynamic Power BI visuals?
value.excerpt: Want to give report users a way to control Power BI visuals dynamically? Don't want to use the personalize visual feature? Interesting!!! Patrick has an approach that may fit the need!  Dynamic X and Y Axis in Power BI visuals? Yes please! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1eurc0EY2Xg  A different perspective

value.title: A quick look at the new Power BI Report Builder
value.excerpt: Patrick takes a quick look at Power BI Report Builder including how to get it. This report builder is optimized for the Power BI service. value.title: Are you thinking about your tooltips in Power BI?
value.excerpt: The base tooltips in Power BI are fine. But are you overusing them? Adding everything to them in your visuals? Adam gives you some things to think about with your tooltips!  Create tooltips based on report pages https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/desktop-tooltips?tabs=powerbi-desktop

value.title: Debugging a slow Power BI report with Phil Seamark

value.title: No Calendar Table? How to add Fiscal Month and Sort in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Thinking you don't need a date table in Power BI? What about Fiscal month? Patrick shows how you could potentially go about adding that without a full date table.  But really, use a central date table üòé  Do you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI? Nope! (Quick Measures) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2f7dYB1l84g

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters
value.excerpt: Paginated reports in Power BI are now available. Patrick walks you through how to get started with a paginated report using Report Builder. In this video, he starts off with how to create an embedded data source, a dataset, and parameters.  To download Report Builder, check out this link: https://guyinacu.be/reportbuilder

value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at Power BI reports and buttons. Buttons were added to Power BI Desktop in the April 2018 release. You can now add buttons to your Power BI reports and configure actions for when they are selected.  Bookmarks and selections are a powerful combination with Power BI reports

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Sort By A Measure Not Shown In Visual
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Patrick shows you how you can sort by a measure not show in a visual within Power BI Desktop. This was something we didn't even know about until recently and it a great little Power BI nugget. If you wanted to sort by something not shown in a visual, this video is for you!

value.excerpt: Patrick looks at how you can get relative dates, in Power BI Desktop, without using the relative date slicer or relative date filters. value.title: Power BI XMLA Endpoint: Why you should care
